name: Eat for Eight Bucks: Bean and Hominy Gratin
description: Bean and hominy gratin isn't quite as tempting as macaroni and cheese, but it's more nutritious (and, if you start with canned hominy and beans, even easier to make).
recipeIngredient: 1 tablespoon adobo sauce or 1/4 teaspoon cayenne pepper (optional)

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat the oven to 400. Lightly grease a 9x9 baking dish.
